experience.description: Responsible for ensuring product compliance with international export regulations.
Assessing the legality of transactions and operations or financial solvency.

Collaborated with the Compliance team to create and maintain KYC records by gathering information from both internal and external sources. Validated customer identification documents and KYC data to ensure completeness and accuracy. Ensured all records met local regulatory requirements and adhered to global compliance standards.

Responsible for the preparation, development, and due diligence of electronic KYC records (CDD and EDD). Cooperated closely with the Compliance team to gather and validate customer information from internal and external sources. Ensured the completeness and accuracy of KYC records and customer identification documents. Maintained compliance with local regulatory requirements and global standards throughout the KYC process.
Investigated activities of institutions to enforce laws and regulations, Assessing the legality of transactions and operations or financial solvency.

courses.description: A professional training focused on identifying and mitigating risks related to sanctions evasion and terrorist financing within the cryptocurrency sector. Covered regulatory challenges and practical compliance strategies.

A comprehensive online bootcamp preparing students for a FullStack Developer role. The program included frontend technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) and backend (Node.js, databases, REST API).
A specialized course by ING covering the use of Python in artificial intelligence and machine learning. It included hands-on projects applying AI in real-world business contexts.
An intensive training program organized by ING, focused on learning Python and software engineering fundamentals. The course was project-based and included mentoring from industry professionals.

An official anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing course accredited by the Polish Financial Intelligence Unit (GIIF). Provided in-depth understanding of AML/CTF regulations and obligations for financial institutions.
